summary: Completed comprehensive testing of tax removal from SmartRepair POS application. Verified that tax calculation has been successfully changed from 10% to 0% in both backend API and frontend UI.
passed_tests: Backend API authentication and token generation
Sales API calculates tax as $0.00 (zero tax)
Sales API total equals subtotal (no tax added)
Multiple items sale maintains zero tax calculation
Frontend sales page loads correctly with inventory items
Frontend maintains zero tax with multiple items
